Room.Name: Prxtl Cave
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the mouth to a maze of grottos and tunnels known as Prxtl Cave.
Room.LongDescription: The mouth of the cave is huge, but the ceiling gets lower towards the back where a great many tunnels are located. A flickering red light comes from several of the tunnels, making it easy to see, but casting shadows that dance on the wall around you. They're very distracting.
